channel.title: CVE Feed for boonebgorges -- BuddyPress Docs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for boonebgorges -- BuddyPress Docs

item.title: CVE-2024-9207|2024-10-08T13:51:33.276Z -- boonebgorges -- buddypress%20docs
item.description: The BuddyPress Docs plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of remove_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-9207|2024-10-08T11:04:23.224Z -- boonebgorges -- buddypress%20docs
item.description: The BuddyPress Docs plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of remove_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
